t:
“I'm sorry Mom, but
I need the money.”



I said, sobbing, as I took out her heart, kidneys and other organs and put them in the cooler.
c:
I started a business from home.



#mother #money #cry #organ #sell #racket #murder #crime





https://www.news.com.au/lifestyle/parenting/kids/mother-accused-of-selling-her-child-for-organs/news-story/b6dc0e993b324bb7d6057f6f725ea170, only the other way around.
